snippet: Stars of Broadway attend official Tony Gala at the Plaza Hotel, and annual after-party at Carlyle Hotel.
abstract: Broadway stars converge at Plaza Hotel for official Tony Gala, and at Caryle Hotel for annual after-party.
lead_paragraph: Stars of Broadway attend official Tony Gala at the Plaza Hotel, and annual after-party at Carlyle Hotel.

headline.print_headline: Curtain Calls in the Wee Hours
